title.text: RFC 5903: Elliptic Curve Groups modulo a Prime (ECP Groups) for IKE and IKEv2

contents.text:
Internet Engineering Task Force (IETF)                             D. Fu
Request for Comments: 5903                                    J. Solinas
Obsoletes: 4753                                                      NSA
Category: Informational                                        June 2010
ISSN: 2070-1721
Elliptic Curve Groups modulo a Prime (ECP Groups) for IKE and IKEv2
contents.zh-CHS: IKE和IKEv2的模a素的椭圆曲线群（ECP群）

contents.text: Abstract

This document describes three Elliptic Curve Cryptography (ECC) groups for use in the Internet Key Exchange (IKE) and Internet Key Exchange version 2 (IKEv2) protocols in addition to previously defined groups. These groups are based on modular arithmetic rather than binary arithmetic. These groups are defined to align IKE and IKEv2 with other ECC implementations and standards, particularly NIST standards. In addition, the curves defined here can provide more efficient implementation than previously defined ECC groups. This document obsoletes RFC 4753.
contents.zh-CHS: 本文档描述了三个椭圆曲线密码（ECC）组，除先前定义的组外，还用于Internet密钥交换（IKE）和Internet密钥交换版本2（IKEv2）协议。这些组基于模运算而不是二进制运算。这些组的定义是使IKE和IKEv2与其他ECC实施和标准，特别是NIST标准保持一致。此外，此处定义的曲线可以提供比以前定义的ECC组更有效的实现。本文件废除了RFC 4753。

contents.text: Status of This Memo
This document is not an Internet Standards Track specification; it is published for informational purposes.
contents.zh-CHS: 本文件不是互联网标准跟踪规范；它是为了提供信息而发布的。

contents.text: This document is a product of the Internet Engineering Task Force (IETF). It represents the consensus of the IETF community. It has received public review and has been approved for publication by the Internet Engineering Steering Group (IESG). Not all documents approved by the IESG are a candidate for any level of Internet Standard; see Section 2 of RFC 5741.
contents.zh-CHS: 本文件是互联网工程任务组（IETF）的产品。它代表了IETF社区的共识。它已经接受了公众审查，并已被互联网工程指导小组（IESG）批准出版。并非IESG批准的所有文件都适用于任何级别的互联网标准；见RFC 5741第2节。

contents.text: Information about the current status of this document, any errata, and how to provide feedback on it may be obtained at http://www.rfc-editor.org/info/rfc5903.
contents.zh-CHS: 有关本文件当前状态、任何勘误表以及如何提供反馈的信息，请访问http://www.rfc-editor.org/info/rfc5903.

contents.text: Table of Contents
1. Introduction

This document describes default Diffie-Hellman groups for use in IKE and IKEv2 in addition to the Oakley Groups included in [IKE] and the additional groups defined since [IANA-IKE]. This document assumes that the reader is familiar with the IKE protocol and the concept of Oakley Groups, as defined in RFC 2409 [IKE].
contents.zh-CHS: 除了[IKE]中包含的Oakley组和自[IANA-IKE]以来定义的其他组之外，本文档还描述了在IKE和IKEv2中使用的默认Diffie-Hellman组。本文档假设读者熟悉RFC 2409[IKE]中定义的IKE协议和Oakley组的概念。

contents.text: RFC 2409 [IKE] defines five standard Oakley Groups: three modular exponentiation groups and two elliptic curve groups over GF[2^N]. One modular exponentiation group (768 bits - Oakley Group 1) is mandatory for all implementations to support, while the other four are optional. Nineteen additional groups subsequently have been defined and assigned values by IANA. All of these additional groups are optional.
contents.zh-CHS: RFC 2409[IKE]定义了五个标准Oakley群：GF[2^N]上的三个模幂群和两个椭圆曲线群。所有实现都必须支持一个模块化求幂组（768位-Oakley组1），而其他四个是可选的。IANA随后定义了另外19个组并为其赋值。所有这些附加组都是可选的。

contents.text: The purpose of this document is to expand the options available to implementers of elliptic curve groups by adding three ECP groups (elliptic curve groups modulo a prime). The reasons for adding such groups include the following.
contents.zh-CHS: 本文档的目的是通过添加三个ECP组（模素数的椭圆曲线组），扩展椭圆曲线组实现者可用的选项。添加此类组的原因包括以下几点。

contents.text: - The groups proposed afford efficiency advantages in software applications since the underlying arithmetic is integer arithmetic modulo a prime rather than binary field arithmetic. (Additional computational advantages for these groups are presented in [GMN].)
contents.zh-CHS: - 由于底层算法是模素数的整数算法，而不是二进制字段算法，因此所提出的组在软件应用中具有效率优势。（这些组的其他计算优势见[GMN]。）

contents.text: - The groups proposed encourage alignment with other elliptic curve standards. The proposed groups are among those standardized by NIST, the Standards for Efficient Cryptography Group (SECG), ISO, and ANSI. (See Section 5 for details.)
contents.zh-CHS: - 提议的团体鼓励与其他椭圆曲线标准保持一致。提议的组是由NIST、高效密码标准组（SECG）、ISO和ANSI标准化的组之一。（详见第5节。）

contents.text: - The groups proposed are capable of providing security consistent with the Advanced Encryption Standard [AES].
contents.zh-CHS: - 建议的组能够提供与高级加密标准[AES]一致的安全性。

contents.text: In summary, due to the performance advantages of elliptic curve groups in IKE implementations and the need for further alignment with other standards, this document defines three elliptic curve groups based on modular arithmetic.
contents.zh-CHS: 综上所述，由于椭圆曲线组在IKE实现中的性能优势以及需要进一步与其他标准保持一致，本文基于模运算定义了三个椭圆曲线组。

contents.text: These groups were originally proposed in [RFC4753]. This document changes the format of the shared key produced by a Diffie-Hellman exchange using these groups. The shared key format used in this specification appeared earlier as an erratum to RFC 4753 [Err9], but some implementors of RFC 4753 were unaware of the erratum and did not implement the correction. Implementations of RFC 4753 that incorporate the correction are interoperable with implementations of this specification. However, there is a potential for interoperability problems between implementations of this
contents.zh-CHS: 这些组最初在[RFC4753]中提出。本文档使用这些组更改Diffie-Hellman交换生成的共享密钥的格式。本规范中使用的共享密钥格式在早些时候作为RFC 4753的勘误表[Err9]出现，但RFC 4753的一些实现者不知道勘误表，并且没有实现更正。包含修正的RFC 4753的实现可与本规范的实现互操作。然而，在该应用程序的实现之间可能存在互操作性问题

contents.text: specification and implementations of RFC 4753 that did not implement the correction from the erratum. These problems could be difficult to detect and analyze since both use the same code point but the secret value (which is probably not available to the trouble desk) is computed differently. Where peers are not interoperable, the initiator will never receive a response and eventually times out.
contents.zh-CHS: 未实施勘误表修正的RFC 4753规范和实施。这些问题可能很难检测和分析，因为两者都使用相同的代码点，但秘密值（故障处理人员可能无法使用）的计算方式不同。当对等点不可互操作时，启动器将永远不会收到响应，并最终超时。

contents.text: Section 9 provides more details of the changes from [RFC4753]. This document obsoletes RFC 4753 and addresses the erratum.
contents.zh-CHS: 第9节提供了[RFC4753]变更的更多细节。本文件废除了RFC 4753，并对勘误表进行了说明。

contents.text: 2. Requirements Terminology
The key words "MUST" and "SHOULD" that appear in this document are to be interpreted as described in [RFC2119].
contents.zh-CHS: 本文件中出现的关键词“必须”和“应该”应按照[RFC2119]中所述进行解释。

contents.text: 3. Additional ECC Groups
The notation adopted in RFC 2409 [IKE] is used below to describe the groups proposed.
contents.zh-CHS: 下文使用RFC 2409[IKE]中采用的符号来描述提议的组。

contents.text: 3.1. 256-Bit Random ECP Group
IKE and IKEv2 implementations SHOULD support an ECP group with the following characteristics. The curve is based on the integers modulo the generalized Mersenne prime p given by:
contents.zh-CHS: IKE和IKEv2实现应支持具有以下特征的ECP组。该曲线基于广义梅森素数p模的整数，由下式给出：

contents.text: The equation for the elliptic curve is:
Field Size: 256
Group Prime/Irreducible Polynomial: FFFFFFFF 00000001 00000000 00000000 00000000 FFFFFFFF FFFFFFFF FFFFFFFF
contents.zh-CHS: 群素数/不可约多项式：FFFFFF00000001 00000000 00000000 FFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFF

contents.text: Group Curve b: 5AC635D8 AA3A93E7 B3EBBD55 769886BC 651D06B0 CC53B0F6 3BCE3C3E 27D2604B
contents.zh-CHS: 组别曲线b:5AC635D8 AA3A93E7 B3EBBD55 769886BC 651D06B0 CC53B0F6 3BE3C3E 27D2604B

contents.text: Group Order: FFFFFFFF 00000000 FFFFFFFF FFFFFFFF BCE6FAAD A7179E84 F3B9CAC2 FC632551
contents.zh-CHS: 集团订单：FFFFFFFF00000000 FFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFBCE6FAAD A7179E84 F3B9CAC2 FC632551

contents.text: The group was chosen verifiably at random using SHA-1 as specified in [IEEE-1363] from the seed:
contents.zh-CHS: 使用[IEEE-1363]中规定的SHA-1从种子中随机选择该组：

contents.text: The generator for this group is given by g=(gx,gy) where:
contents.zh-CHS: 该组的生成器由g=（gx，gy）给出，其中：

contents.text: gy: 4FE342E2 FE1A7F9B 8EE7EB4A 7C0F9E16 2BCE3357 6B315ECE CBB64068 37BF51F5
3.2. 384-Bit Random ECP Group
IKE and IKEv2 implementations SHOULD support an ECP group with the following characteristics. The curve is based on the integers modulo the generalized Mersenne prime p given by:
contents.zh-CHS: IKE和IKEv2实现应支持具有以下特征的ECP组。该曲线基于广义梅森素数p模的整数，由下式给出：

Field Size: 384
Group Prime/Irreducible Polynomial: FFFFFFFF FFFFFFFF FFFFFFFF FFFFFFFF FFFFFFFF FFFFFFFF FFFFFFFF FFFFFFFE FFFFFFFF 00000000 00000000 FFFFFFFF

Group Order: FFFFFFFF FFFFFFFF FFFFFFFF FFFFFFFF FFFFFFFF FFFFFFFF C7634D81 F4372DDF 581A0DB2 48B0A77A ECEC196A CCC52973
The group was chosen verifiably at random using SHA-1 as specified in [IEEE-1363] from the seed:
contents.zh-CHS: 使用[IEEE-1363]中规定的SHA-1从种子中随机选择该组：

contents.text: A335926A A319A27A 1D00896A 6773A482 7ACDAC73 The generator for this group is given by g=(gx,gy) where:
contents.zh-CHS: A335926A A319A27A 1D00896A 6773A482 7ACDAC73此组的发电机由g=（gx，gy）给出，其中：

contents.text: gy: 3617DE4A 96262C6F 5D9E98BF 9292DC29 F8F41DBD 289A147C E9DA3113 B5F0B8C0 0A60B1CE 1D7E819D 7A431D7C 90EA0E5F
3.3. 521-Bit Random ECP Group
IKE and IKEv2 implementations SHOULD support an ECP group with the following characteristics. The curve is based on the integers modulo the Mersenne prime p given by:
contents.zh-CHS: IKE和IKEv2实现应支持具有以下特征的ECP组。该曲线基于以下公式给出的梅森素数p的整数模：

contents.text: The equation for the elliptic curve is:
Field Size: 521
Group Prime/Irreducible Polynomial: 01FFFFFF FFFFFFFF FFFFFFFF FFFFFFFF FFFFFFFF FFFFFFFF FFFFFFFF FFFFFFFF FFFFFFFF FFFFFFFF FFFFFFFF FFFFFFFF FFFFFFFF FFFFFFFF FFFFFFFF FFFFFFFF FFFF
Group Order: 01FFFFFF FFFFFFFF FFFFFFFF FFFFFFFF FFFFFFFF FFFFFFFF FFFFFFFF FFFFFFFF FFFA5186 8783BF2F 966B7FCC 0148F709 A5D03BB5 C9B8899C 47AEBB6F B71E9138 6409
The group was chosen verifiably at random using SHA-1 as specified in [IEEE-1363] from the seed:
contents.zh-CHS: 使用[IEEE-1363]中规定的SHA-1从种子中随机选择该组：

contents.text: The generator for this group is given by g=(gx,gy) where:
contents.zh-CHS: 该组的生成器由g=（gx，gy）给出，其中：

contents.text: 4. Security Considerations
Since this document proposes groups for use within IKE and IKEv2, many of the security considerations contained within [IKE] and [IKEv2] apply here as well.
contents.zh-CHS: 由于本文档建议在IKE和IKEv2中使用组，[IKE]和[IKEv2]中包含的许多安全注意事项也适用于此处。

contents.text: The groups proposed in this document correspond to the symmetric key sizes 128 bits, 192 bits, and 256 bits. This allows the IKE key exchange to offer security comparable with the AES algorithms [AES].
contents.zh-CHS: 本文档中建议的组对应于对称密钥大小128位、192位和256位。这允许IKE密钥交换提供与AES算法[AES]相当的安全性。

contents.text: 5. Alignment with Other Standards
The following table summarizes the appearance of these three elliptic curve groups in other standards.
contents.zh-CHS: 下表总结了这三个椭圆曲线组在其他标准中的外观。

contents.text:
256-Bit        384-Bit        521-Bit
                        Random         Random         Random
Standard                ECP Group      ECP Group      ECP Group
-----------             ------------   ------------   ------------
NIST [DSS] P-256 P-384 P-521
ISO/IEC [ISO-15946-1] P-256
ANSI [X9.62-1998] Sect. J.5.3, Example 1 ANSI [X9.62-2005] Sect. L.6.4.3 Sect. L.6.5.2 Sect. L.6.6.2
ANSI [X9.63] Sect. J.5.4, Sect. J.5.5 Sect. J.5.6 Example 2
SECG [SEC2] secp256r1 secp384r1 secp521r1
6. IANA Considerations
IANA has updated its registries of Diffie-Hellman groups for IKE in [IANA-IKE] and for IKEv2 in [IANA-IKEv2] to include the groups defined above.
contents.zh-CHS: IANA已更新了[IANA-IKE]中IKE和[IANA-IKEv2]中IKEv2的Diffie-Hellman组的注册表，以包括上述定义的组。

contents.text: In [IANA-IKE], the groups appear as entries in the list of Diffie-Hellman groups given by Group Description (attribute class 4).
contents.zh-CHS: 在[IANA-IKE]中，组作为条目出现在由组描述（属性类4）给出的Diffie-Hellman组列表中。

contents.text: The descriptions are "256-bit random ECP group", "384-bit random ECP group", and "521-bit random ECP group". In each case, the group type (attribute class 5) has the value 2 (ECP, elliptic curve group over GF[P]).
contents.zh-CHS: 描述为“256位随机ECP组”、“384位随机ECP组”和“521位随机ECP组”。在每种情况下，组类型（属性类5）的值为2（ECP，GF[P]上的椭圆曲线组）。

contents.text: In [IANA-IKEv2], the groups appear as entries in the list of IKEv2 transform type values for Transform Type 4 (Diffie-Hellman groups).
contents.zh-CHS: 在[IANA-IKEv2]中，组作为条目出现在变换类型4（Diffie-Hellman组）的IKEv2变换类型值列表中。

contents.text: These entries in both [IANA-IKE] and [IANA-IKEv2] have been updated. The update consisted of changing the reference from [RFC4753] to this document.
contents.zh-CHS: [IANA-IKE]和[IANA-IKEv2]中的这些条目都已更新。更新包括将参考文献从[RFC4753]更改为本文件。

contents.text: 7. ECP Key Exchange Data Formats

In an ECP key exchange, the Diffie-Hellman public value passed in a KE payload consists of two components, x and y, corresponding to the coordinates of an elliptic curve point. Each component MUST have bit length as given in the following table.
contents.zh-CHS: 在ECP密钥交换中，在KE有效载荷中传递的Diffie-Hellman公共值由两个分量组成，x和y，对应于椭圆曲线点的坐标。每个组件必须具有下表中给出的位长度。

contents.text:
Diffie-Hellman group                component bit length
------------------------            --------------------
256-bit Random ECP Group 256 384-bit Random ECP Group 384 521-bit Random ECP Group 528
contents.zh-CHS: 256位随机ECP组256 384位随机ECP组384 521位随机ECP组528

contents.text: This length is enforced, if necessary, by prepending the value with zeros.
contents.zh-CHS: 如有必要，可通过在值前面加零来强制执行此长度。

contents.text: The Diffie-Hellman public value is obtained by concatenating the x and y values.
contents.zh-CHS: Diffie-Hellman公共值是通过连接x和y值获得的。

contents.text: The Diffie-Hellman shared secret value consists of the x value of the Diffie-Hellman common value.
contents.zh-CHS: Diffie-Hellman共享秘密值由Diffie-Hellman公共值的x值组成。

contents.text: These formats should be regarded as specific to ECP curves and may not be applicable to EC2N (elliptic curve group over GF[2^N]) curves.
contents.zh-CHS: 这些格式应视为特定于ECP曲线，可能不适用于EC2N（GF[2^N]上的椭圆曲线群）曲线。

contents.text: 8. Test Vectors
The following are examples of the IKEv2 key exchange payload for each of the three groups specified in this document.
contents.zh-CHS: 以下是本文档中指定的三个组的IKEv2密钥交换有效负载示例。

contents.text: We denote by g^n the scalar multiple of the point g by the integer n; it is another point on the curve. In the literature, the scalar multiple is typically denoted ng; the notation g^n is used in order to conform to the notation used in [IKE] and [IKEv2].
contents.zh-CHS: 我们用g^n表示点g的整数n的标量倍数；这是曲线上的另一点。在文献中，标量倍数通常表示为ng；使用符号g^n是为了符合[IKE]和[IKEv2]中使用的符号。

contents.text: 8.1. 256-Bit Random ECP Group
IANA assigned the ID value 19 to this Diffie-Hellman group.
We suppose that the initiator's Diffie-Hellman private key is:
contents.zh-CHS: 我们假设发起人的Diffie Hellman私钥为：

contents.text: Then the public key is given by g^i=(gix,giy) where:
The KEi payload is as follows.
We suppose that the response Diffie-Hellman private key is:

The Diffie-Hellman common value (girx,giry) is:

8.3. 521-Bit Random ECP Group
IANA assigned the ID value 21 to this Diffie-Hellman group.
We suppose that the initiator's Diffie-Hellman private key is:

The KEi payload is as follows.
We suppose that the response Diffie-Hellman private key is:

The KEr payload is as follows.
The Diffie-Hellman common value (girx,giry) is:
giry: 01B901E6 B17DB294 7AC017D8 53EF1C16 74E5CFE5 9CDA18D0 78E05D1B 5242ADAA 9FFC3C63 EA05EDB1 E13CE5B3 A8E50C3E B622E8DA 1B38E0BD D1F88569 D6C99BAF FA43
contents.zh-CHS: giry:01B901E6 B17DB294 7AC017D8 53EF1C16 74E5CFE5 9CDA18D0 78E05D1B 5242ADA 9FFC3C63 EA05EDB1 E13CE5B3 A8E50C3E B622E8DA 1B38E0BD D1F88569 D6C99BAF FA43

contents.text: The Diffie-Hellman shared secret value is girx.
9. Changes from RFC 4753
Section 7 (ECP Key Exchange Data Formats) of [RFC4753] states that
contents.zh-CHS: [RFC4753]第7节（ECP密钥交换数据格式）规定：

contents.text: The Diffie-Hellman public value is obtained by concatenating the x and y values.
contents.zh-CHS: Diffie-Hellman公共值是通过连接x和y值获得的。

contents.text: The format of the Diffie-Hellman shared secret value is the same as that of the Diffie-Hellman public value.
contents.zh-CHS: Diffie-Hellman共享秘密值的格式与Diffie-Hellman公共值的格式相同。

contents.text: This document replaces the second of these two paragraphs with the following:
contents.zh-CHS: 本文件将这两段中的第二段替换为以下内容：

contents.text: The Diffie-Hellman shared secret value consists of the x value of the Diffie-Hellman common value.
contents.zh-CHS: Diffie-Hellman共享秘密值由Diffie-Hellman公共值的x值组成。

contents.text: This change aligns the ECP key exchange format with that used in other standards.
contents.zh-CHS: 此更改使ECP密钥交换格式与其他标准中使用的格式保持一致。

contents.text: This change appeared earlier as an erratum to RFC 4753 [Err9]. This document obsoletes RFC 4753 and addresses the erratum.
contents.zh-CHS: 这一变化早些时候作为RFC 4753的勘误表出现[Err9]。本文件废除了RFC 4753，并对勘误表进行了说明。

contents.text: Section 8 (Test Vectors) of [RFC4753] provides three examples of Diffie-Hellman key agreement using the ECP groups. This document changes the last paragraph of each subsection of Section 8 to reflect the new format.
contents.zh-CHS: [RFC4753]第8节（测试向量）提供了使用ECP组的Diffie-Hellman密钥协议的三个示例。本文件更改了第8节各小节的最后一段，以反映新的格式。
